SELECT * from (
SELECT waringTb.skuId AS "skuId", waringTb.max AS "inventoryCeiling", waringTb.min AS "inventoryFloor", waringTb.createTime as "createTime", waringTb.createUser as "createUser", IF ( sum( CASE WHEN details.display = 1 AND details.stage = 1 THEN details.number ELSE 0 END ) IS NULL, 0, sum( CASE WHEN details.display = 1 AND details.stage = 1 THEN details.number ELSE 0 END )) AS "number"
FROM ( SELECT sku.sku_id AS "skuId", waring.inventory_floor AS "min", waring.inventory_ceiling AS "max", waring.create_time AS "createTime", waring.create_user AS "createUser" FROM daoxin_erp_stock_forewarn waring LEFT JOIN goods_spu_class class ON waring.form_id = class.spu_classification_id INNER JOIN goods_spu spu ON spu.spu_classification_id = class.spu_classification_id INNER JOIN goods_sku sku ON sku.spu_id = spu.spu_id where 1 = 1 and sku.display = 1 and waring.display = 1
and ( spu.name like CONCAT ('%',#{paramCondition.keyWords},'%') or sku.sku_name like CONCAT ('%',#{paramCondition.keyWords},'%') or sku.standard like CONCAT ('%',#{paramCondition.keyWords},'%') )
and class.spu_classification_id = #{paramCondition.classId}
GROUP BY sku.sku_id, waring.inventory_floor, waring.inventory_ceiling ) waringTb LEFT JOIN daoxin_erp_stock_details details ON details.sku_id = waringTb.skuId WHERE 1 = 1 AND waringTb.skuId IS NOT NULL GROUP BY waringTb.skuId

and ( spu.name like CONCAT ('%',#{paramCondition.keyWords},'%') or sku.sku_name like CONCAT ('%',#{paramCondition.keyWords},'%') or sku.standard like CONCAT ('%',#{paramCondition.keyWords},'%') )
and class.spu_classification_id = #{paramCondition.classId}
GROUP BY sku.sku_id, waring.inventory_floor, waring.inventory_ceiling ) waringTb LEFT JOIN daoxin_erp_stock_details details ON waringTb.skuId = details.sku_id WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY waringTb.skuId
